ModMetaData.name: [I3] SRTSE: The Star Fleet
ModMetaData.author: いのしし_3
ModMetaData.description:
<color=yellow>~ (The Star Fleet) ~</color>
✲ This mod adds in Rim 3 hi-tech transport shuttles. ✲ Этот мод добавляет в Римку 3 высокотехнологичных транспортных шаттла.
<color=yellow>~ (Details | Подробности) ~</color>
✲ Details are on the workshop page of this mod. ✲ Подробности на главной странице мода в воркшопе.
<color=yellow>~ (Credits) ~</color>
Rep+ and thanks to SRTS Expanded's creators for the SRTSE framework, they made this mod possible. Thanks to Proxyer for japanese translation of The Star Fleet.
